import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './App.css' // import Lodging from './components/Lodging' const Lodging = ({lodgings}) => { var people = lodging.adults + lodging.children return ( Etunimi Sukunimi {lodging.arrival} {lodging.departure} {people} ) } const App = () => { const [lodging, setLodgings] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { console.log('effect') axios .get('http://localhost:3001/api/lodgings') .then(response => { console.log('promise fulfilled') setLodgings(response.data) }) }, []) return (

Le Motel de Puro

{lodgings.map(lodging => )}
Nimi Saapumispäivä Lähtöpäivä Henkilöt

Heta Puro 2022

) } export default App
